archimate:Requirement.name: 4.23.5 Systems Development Implementation & Maintenance Requirements Control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Business requirements should take into account implementation and maintenance requirements, including: a) the provision of arrangements to support systems in the live environment (e.g. the need for a helpdesk or technical support) b) fall-back/contingency plans c) the reduction or elimination of single points of failure d) new security and development techniques and lessons learned (e.g. from security incidents, threat intelligence, penetration testing, other development projects and security thought leadership).
